<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to update the reference qualifier on rm_epic table.</description>
        <name>Fix reference qualifier for parent_epic</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateRefQualForElement('parent_epic',
						"'sys_idIN'+ScrumSecurityManager.getEpicDotParentEpic(current).join(',')",
						'javascript:ScrumSecurityManager.getEpicDotParentEpic(current)');

function updateRefQualForElement(element, oldReference, newReference) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'rm_epic');
	gr.addQuery('element', element);
	gr.addQuery('reference_qual', 'CONTAINS', oldReference);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.next()) {
		gs.log('Found old reference qualifier for ' + element + ' on rm_epic. Updating it...');
		gr.setValue('reference_qual', newReference);
		if (gr.update())
			gs.log('Updated reference qualifier for ' + element + ' on rm_epic');
		else
			gs.log('Updating reference qualifier for ' + element + ' on rm_epic failed');
	} else
		gs.log("Not attempting to replace reference qualifier for '" + oldReference + "'. The reference qualifier may have been modified and hence will be left unchanged");
}]]></script>
